title: Basic Usage
content: Use v-model to set the default selected button and implement bidirectional binding. You can also set the default selected button through value, but bidirectional binding cannot be performed.
findIntroStr: A button group is used for multiple similar operations.

title: button group data
content: Sets the button group data through the data attribute. In the object, text is the button display text, and value is the value specified during bidirectional binding.

title: Disabled
content: Set disabled to true to disable the entire button group.

title: Simple button
content: Set plain to true to display the simple button style.
findIntroStr: A button group is used for multiple similar operations.

title: Data Field Mapping
content: If the fields in the button group data object are not the default text and value, the text-field and value-field attributes can be used for mapping.
findIntroStr: A button group is used for multiple similar operations.

title: Display More Buttons
content: Set the show-more attribute to a value greater than 0 and less than the button group data to display more buttons.
findIntroStr: A button group is used for multiple similar operations.

title: Display Edit Button
content: Set show-edit to true to display the edit button.

title: Change Event
content: The change event is triggered when the selected button is changed.

title: Edit Event

title: Default slot
content: When the default slot mode is used, the data, text-field, value-field, value / v-model, and size attributes of the ButtonGroup do not take effect for buttons in the slot. However, you can set different attributes for different buttons on the Button component tag based on the application scenario. For details, see Button Component Attributes.

title: Button Group Multiple
content: Multi-line button group, after exceeding the maximum width, it will be displayed in a new line.

title: Border
content: Set with or without border, the default is true.
